properties.description: OJO. En el sink NO estÃ¡ puesto el Auto mapping

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID_ESTACIO as decimal(8,0),
		ID_PLA as decimal(8,0),
		DATA_ANYO as integer,
		ID_ESTAT as decimal(1,0),
		ID_ESTACIO_AFIN as decimal(8,0),
		ID_DETECTOR as decimal(3,0),
		ID_EQUIP as decimal(3,0),
		ID_ALIMENTACIO as decimal(3,0),
		ID_TIPUS_ESTACIO as decimal(2,0),
		ID_FACTOR as decimal(8,0),
		ID_PLANOL as decimal(8,0),
		ID_ESTACIO_REF_1 as decimal(8,0),
		ID_ESTACIO_REF_2 as decimal(8,0),
		ID_LLOGARET as string,
		COD_INE as string,
		COD_ESTACIO as string,
		COD_ORGTRAM as string,
		COD_CARRETERA as string,
		COD_MOD_CARRETERA as decimal(15,0),
		COD_TRAM as string,
		COD_SUBTRAM as string,
		DESC_CARRILS as string,
		NUM_TELEFON as decimal(12,0),
		DESC_ESTACIO as string,
		DESC_OBSERVACIONS as string,
		PK as decimal(9,0),
		METRES_PK as decimal(4,0),
		UTMX as decimal(10,2),
		UTMY as decimal(10,2),
		NUM_LONGITUD as double,
		NUM_LATITUD as double,
		PK_INI as decimal(9,0),
		METRES_PK_INI as decimal(4,0),
		DESC_PK_INI as string,
		PK_FI as decimal(9,0),
		METRES_PK_FI as decimal(4,0),
		DESC_PK_FI as string,
		IND_IMD as decimal(8,0),
		IND_PESANTS as decimal(7,4),
		IND_IFA as decimal(7,4),
		IND_VELOC_MITJA as decimal(7,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DMDimEstacioSubTr5
source(output(
		CODI_INE as string,
		COD_MUNICIPI as string,
		DESC_MUNICIPI as string,
		CODI_LLOGARET as string,
		DESC_POBLACIO as string,
		CODI_COMARCA as string,
		DESC_COMARCA as string,
		CODI_PROVINCIA as string,
		DESC_PROVINCIA as string,
		CODI_AMBIT as string,
		DESC_AMBIT as string,
		CODI_VEGUERIA as string,
		DESC_VEGUERIA as string,
		PK_CONCAT_INE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DMDimTerritorial
source(output(
		ID_TIPUS_ESTACIO as integer,
		DESC_TIPUS_ESTACIO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DMDimTipusEstacio
source(output(
		ID_PLA as decimal(8,0),
		ID_ORGANISME as string,
		ID_PLA_GENERAL as decimal(8,0),
		ID_ESTAT_PLA as decimal(1,0),
		DESC_PLA as string,
		FLAG_PENDENT as decimal(1,0),
		FLAG_FINALITZAT as decimal(1,0),
		DATA_INI as timestamp,
		DATA_FI as timestamp,
		DATA_INI_PROCES as timestamp,
		DATA_FI_PROCES as timestamp,
		DATA_GENERAT as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DMDimPla
source(output(
		ID_COMARCA as decimal(2,0),
		COD_CARRETERA as string,
		COD_TRAM as string,
		COD_SUBTRAM as string,
		COD_MODIFICACIO as decimal(15,0),
		COD_ORGANISME as string,
		COD_ORGTRAM as string,
		PK_INI as decimal(9,0),
		METRES_PK_INI as decimal(4,0),
		DESC_PK_INI as string,
		PK_FI as decimal(9,0),
		METRES_FI as decimal(4,0),
		DESC_PK_FI as string,
		IND_IMD as decimal(2,0),
		NUM_LONG_REAL as decimal(9,3),
		NUM_LONG_APARENT as decimal(9,3),
		DESC_NOM_CARRILS as string,
		DATA_CALCUL_IMD as string,
		DATA_ALTA as string,
		DATA_BAIXA as string,
		DATA_VALIDACIO as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DMDimSUBTRAM5
source(output(
		PK_CONCAT as string,
		ID_ESTACIO as decimal(8,0),
		ID_SECCIO as decimal(8,0),
		DESC_SECCIO as string,
		DATA_ANYO as integer,
		IND_IFA as decimal(10,2),
		IND_VELOC_MITJA as decimal(7,2),
		IND_VELOCITAT_MITJA_SENTIT as decimal(38,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DMPlaAnyalIFAVeloc
source(output(
		PK_CONCAT as string,
		ID_ESTACIO as integer,
		DATA_ANYO as integer,
		DATA_MES as integer,
		GRUP as string,
		CONCEPTE as string,
		IND as decimal(38,4),
		POSICIO as integer,
		POSICIO2 as integer,
		CONCAT_GRUP_CONCEPTE as string,
		CONCAT_POSICIO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DMPlaAnyal
AddLongitudTram, DMDimTerritorial join(COD_INE == CODI_INE
	&& ID_LLOGARET == CODI_LLOGARET,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTERRITORIAL
JoinSUBTRAM select(mapColumn(
		ID_ESTACIO,
		ID_ESTACIO_AFIN,
		COD_ESTACIO,
		DESC_ESTACIO,
		DATA_ANYO,
		NUM_LONGITUD,
		NUM_LATITUD,
		ID_PLA,
		ID_TIPUS_ESTACIO,
		ID_LLOGARET,
		COD_INE,
		COD_CARRETERA = DMDimEstacioSubTr5@COD_CARRETERA,
		METRES_PK,
		PK,
		COD_ORGANISME,
		DESC_PK_INI = DMDimEstacioSubTr5@DESC_PK_INI,
		PK_INI = DMDimSUBTRAM5@PK_INI,
		METRES_PK_INI = DMDimSUBTRAM5@METRES_PK_INI,
		DESC_PK_FI = DMDimEstacioSubTr5@DESC_PK_FI,
		PK_FI = DMDimSUBTRAM5@PK_FI,
		METRES_FI,
		IND_IFA,
		IND_IMD = DMDimEstacioSubTr5@IND_IMD,
		IND_PESANTS,
		IND_VELOC_MITJA,
		DESC_CARRILS = DESC_NOM_CARRILS,
		COD_ORGTRAM = DMDimEstacioSubTr5@COD_ORGTRAM
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FiltraCampos
AddDemarcacio, DMDimTipusEstacio join(FiltraCampos@ID_TIPUS_ESTACIO == DMDimTipusEstacio@ID_TIPUS_ESTACIO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTipusESTACIO
joinPESANTS aggregate(groupBy(FiltraCampos@ID_ESTACIO,
		ID_ESTACIO_AFIN,
		DESC_ESTACIO,
		NUM_PK,
		NUM_PK_INI,
		NUM_PK_FI,
		NUM_LONG_SUBTRAM,
		COD_ESTACIO,
		DATA_ANYO,
		COD_CARRETERA,
		NUM_LONGITUD,
		NUM_LATITUD,
		COD_INE,
		COD_ORGANISME,
		DESC_PK_INI,
		DESC_PK_FI,
		FiltraCampsIFAVeloc@IND_IFA,
		FiltraCampsPlaAnyalIMD@IND_IMD,
		FiltraCampsPlaAnyalPESANT@IND_PESANTS,
		FiltraCampsIFAVeloc@IND_VELOC_MITJA,
		DESC_CARRILS,
		COD_ORGTRAM,
		PK_CONCAT_INE,
		DESC_DEMARCACIO,
		DESC_TIPUS_ESTACIO,
		DATA_INI,
		DATA_FI),
	count = count(FiltraCampos@ID_PLA)) ~> Distinct
DMDimEstacioSubTr5, DMDimSUBTRAM5 join(DMDimEstacioSubTr5@COD_CARRETERA == DMDimSUBTRAM5@COD_CARRETERA
	&& DMDimEstacioSubTr5@COD_TRAM == DMDimSUBTRAM5@COD_TRAM
	&& DMDimEstacioSubTr5@COD_SUBTRAM == DMDimSUBTRAM5@COD_SUBTRAM
	&& COD_MOD_CARRETERA == COD_MODIFICACIO,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSUBTRAM
FiltraCampos derive(NUM_LONG_SUBTRAM = toDouble(toDouble(PK_FI) + toDouble(METRES_FI/1000) - toDouble(PK_INI) + toDouble(METRES_PK_INI/1000)),
		NUM_PK_INI = toDouble(toDouble(PK_INI) + toDouble(METRES_PK_INI/1000)),
		NUM_PK_FI = toDouble(toDouble(PK_FI) + toDouble(METRES_FI/1000)),
		NUM_PK = toDouble(toDouble(PK) + toDouble(METRES_PK/1000))) ~> AddLongitudTram
JoinTERRITORIAL derive(DESC_DEMARCACIO = iif(CODI_PROVINCIA == '43', iif(CODI_VEGUERIA  == 'E', "Terres",'Tarragona') ,iif(CODI_PROVINCIA == '08','Barcelona',iif(CODI_PROVINCIA == '17','Girona',iif(CODI_PROVINCIA == '25','Lleida','-1'))))) ~> AddDemarcacio
JoinTipusESTACIO, DMDimPla join(FiltraCampos@ID_PLA == DMDimPla@ID_PLA,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinPLA
AddUltimAnyInformat select(mapColumn(
		ID_ESTACIO,
		ID_ESTACIO_AFIN,
		DATA_ANYO,
		DATA_ULTIM_ANYO_INFORMAT,
		DESC_TIPUS_ESTACIO,
		COD_ESTACIO,
		COD_CARRETERA,
		COD_INE,
		COD_ORGANISME,
		COD_ORGTRAM,
		IND_IMD,
		IND_PESANTS,
		IND_VELOC_MITJA,
		IND_IFA,
		DESC_ESTACIO,
		DESC_CARRILS,
		DESC_DEMARCACIO,
		NUM_PK,
		DESC_PK_INI,
		NUM_PK_INI,
		DESC_PK_FI,
		NUM_PK_FI,
		NUM_LONG_SUBTRAM,
		NUM_LATITUD,
		NUM_LONGITUD,
		PK_CONCAT_INE,
		DATA_INI_PLA = DATA_INI,
		DATA_FI_PLA = DATA_FI
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReordenaCmapos
joinPLA, FiltraCampsIFAVeloc join(FiltraCampos@ID_ESTACIO == FiltraCampsIFAVeloc@ID_ESTACIO,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinIFAVeloc
DMPlaAnyalIFAVeloc select(mapColumn(
		ID_ESTACIO,
		IND_IFA,
		IND_VELOC_MITJA
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FiltraCampsIFAVeloc
filterIMD select(mapColumn(
		ID_ESTACIO,
		IND_IMD = IND
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FiltraCampsPlaAnyalIMD
DMPlaAnyal filter(CONCAT_GRUP_CONCEPTE == 'INTENSITATS MITJANESIMD' && DATA_MES == 13) ~> filterIMD
joinIFAVeloc, FiltraCampsPlaAnyalIMD join(FiltraCampos@ID_ESTACIO == FiltraCampsPlaAnyalIMD@ID_ESTACIO,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinIMD
DMPlaAnyal filter(CONCAT_GRUP_CONCEPTE == 'VOLUM PER LONGITUD6-X m' && DATA_MES == 13) ~> filterPesant
filterPesant select(mapColumn(
		ID_ESTACIO,
		IND_PESANTS = IND
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FiltraCampsPlaAnyalPESANT
joinIMD, FiltraCampsPlaAnyalPESANT join(FiltraCampos@ID_ESTACIO == FiltraCampsPlaAnyalPESANT@ID_ESTACIO,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinPESANTS
Distinct derive(DATA_ULTIM_ANYO_INFORMAT = DATA_ANYO) ~> AddUltimAnyInformat
ReordenaCmapos sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID_ESTACIO as decimal(8,0),
		ID_ESTACIO_AFIN as decimal(8,0),
		DATA_ANYO as integer,
		DATA_ULTIM_ANYO_INFORMAT as integer,
		DESC_ESTACIO as string,
		DESC_TIPUS_ESTACIO as string,
		COD_ESTACIO as string,
		COD_CARRETERA as string,
		COD_INE as string,
		COD_ORGANISME as string,
		COD_ORGTRAM as string,
		IND_IMD as decimal(38,4),
		IND_PESANTS as decimal(38,4),
		IND_VELOC_MITJA as decimal(7,2),
		IND_IFA as decimal(10,2),
		DESC_CARRILS as string,
		DESC_DEMARCACIO as string,
		NUM_PK as double,
		DESC_PK_INI as string,
		NUM_PK_INI as double,
		DESC_PK_FI as string,
		NUM_PK_FI as double,
		NUM_LONG_SUBTRAM as double,
		NUM_LATITUD as double,
		NUM_LONGITUD as double,
		PK_CONCAT_INE as string,
		DATA_INI_PLA as timestamp,
		DATA_FI_PLA as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DMDIMResumEstacio
